meanings.def: the act of fixing equipment or furniture in position so that it can be used
examples: Installation of the new system will take several days.

meanings.def: a piece of equipment or a machine that has been fixed in position so that it can be used
the act of putting a new program onto a computer
a place where specialist equipment is kept and used
the act of placing somebody in a new position of authority, often with a ceremony
examples: the installation of the new chancellor

meanings.def: a piece of modern sculpture that is made using sound, light, etc. as well as objects
